It's essential to acknowledge that my views are not without controversy, and I expect intense criticism and opposition. In the face of environmental catastrophe, I firmly believe that we must be willing to question everything, including our most deeply held taboos and values. By doing so, we may uncover novel approaches to mitigating humanity's impact on the planet and ensuring a livable future for generations to come.
